mapper.select: SELECT n.notice_id AS noticeId, u.full_name AS writer, n.title, n.content, n.created_at AS createdAt, n.view_count AS viewCount FROM Notices n LEFT JOIN Users u ON n.writer = u.user_id ORDER BY n.created_at DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Notices (writer, title, content, created_at) VALUES (#{writer}, #{title}, #{content}, NOW())
mapper.update: UPDATE Notices SET title = #{title}, content = #{content}, updated_at = NOW() WHERE notice_id = #{noticeId}
